articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Wales vs Montenegro in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Wales vs Montenegro: Uefa Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Randal Kolo Muani scores twice as France beat Belgium in an incident-packed Uefa Nations League match in Brussels.
articles.title: Belgium 1-2 France: Randal Kolo Muani hits double to seal success

articles.description: Daniel Maldini becomes the third generation of his family to play for Italy as he makes his debut in a Nations League win over Israel.
articles.title: Italy 4-1 Israel: Third generation of Maldini plays for Azzurri

articles.description: New Zealand beat Pakistan by 54 runs to reach their first Women's T20 World Cup semi-final since 2016.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup results: New Zealand beat Pakistan to reach semi-final

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes is fit to play in the second Test against Pakistan in Multan, coming in alongside pace bowler Matthew Potts.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Ben Stokes and Matthew Potts return for second Test

articles.description: Former Manchester City defender Benjamin Mendy says he was lent money by his then team-mates Raheem Sterling, Bernardo Silva and Riyad Mahrez when the club stopped paying him after he was charged with rape and sexual assault.
articles.title: Benjamin Mendy: Ex-Man City player claiming £11.5m in unpaid wages from club at employment tribunal

articles.description: With interim head coach Lee Carsley not being drawn on the permanent England manager job, BBC Sport looks at what happens next.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: What happens next with England manager search?

articles.description: How the Kenyan took a step beyond what was thought by knocking almost two minutes off the previous best in Chicago.
articles.title: Ruth Chepngetich's marathon world record - stats and shoes behind Chicago time

articles.description: Hugo Viana will become Manchester City's director of football next season - BBC Sport's Marcus Alves looks at his rise and friendship with manager Ruben Amorim.
articles.title: Hugo Viana to Manchester City: From 'planet's best youngster' to Sporting Lisbon's 'magic man'

articles.description: The French Rugby Federation expresses its "firm opposition" to the proposed 20-minute red card, saying it is an "unacceptable step backwards" by World Rugby.
articles.title: French Rugby Federation expresses 'firm opposition' to 20-minute red card
